definition: lithosphere (in geology, the rigid crust of the earth)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: The tectonic stress the Earth are mainly on the upper lithosphere.
sentences.chinese: 地球內部構造應力主要集中於岩石圈上層。

sentences.english: The quartz tholeiites may be the products of the melts of lithospheric mantle.
sentences.chinese: 石英拉斑玄武岩是岩石圈地幔的熔漿。

sentences.english: The crust and lithosphere of the Tibet is very thick, and the LVZ is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原地殼岩石圈巨厚，上地幔低速帶不明顯。

sentences.english: Bohaiwan basin features the alter nations of thinning and thickening of lithospherical mantle.
sentences.chinese: 渤海灣盆地則以岩石圈地幔減薄與增厚波動爲特徵。

sentences.english: The relationship between polymetallic mineralization and lithospheric thinning and crustal extension.
sentences.chinese: 多金屬成礦作用與岩石圈伸展減薄及地殼拉張的關係。

sentences.english: Earthquakes along benioff zones are distributed in the descending lithosphere slabs.
sentences.chinese: 貝尼奧夫帶的地震都分佈在下降岩石圈板塊內。

sentences.english: South China Sea is a marginal graben block bounded by crustal faults.
sentences.chinese: 南海是由岩石圈斷裂所圍限的陸緣地塹斷塊。

sentences.english: The existence and movement of large lithospheric plates seems well established.
sentences.chinese: 巨大岩石圈板塊的存在與位移似乎已完全確定了。

sentences.english: The deformation of lithosphere results from several force sources.
sentences.chinese: 岩石圈形變是各種力源綜合作用的結果。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the pluton formed in lithosphere extension environment.
sentences.chinese: 產出於岩石圈伸展拉張環境。

sentences.english: Below the lithosphere is the rheosphere comprising partly fused peridotite .
sentences.chinese: 岩石圈之下是由部分熔融的橄欖岩所組成的軟流圈。

definition: Moho (aka Mohorovičić discontinuity, the lower boundary of the earth's lithosphere)
